title: EXCLUSIVE - Vance blames Zelenskyy blowup on Biden's Ukraine policy
shortDescription: “Sometimes people disagree,” Vance said of his televised Oval Office spat with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy earlier this year.

title: Exclusive: VP Vance denies Trump enemies list
shortDescription: Vice President JD Vance said President Donald Trump is focused on law enforcement, not political retaliation, in an exclusive interview.

title: Here's what several new polls say about Trump's approval rating
shortDescription: Four leading pollsters released surveys this week, amid the president's controversial National Guard deployments to the nation's capital. Here's what they say.

title: EXCLUSIVE - Trump doesn't want troops in cities 'indefinitely,' Vance says
shortDescription: Vice President JD Vance told USA TODAY the Trump administration doesn't plan to keep National Guard troops in cities long-term to fight crime.

title: Partisanship peaks in new Trump approval rating poll. See results.
shortDescription: Gallup's August poll shows a historically high partisan divide.

title: Trump asks Supreme Court to halt foreign aid payments
shortDescription: The Trump administration wants the Supreme Court to block a judge's ruling that the White House can't sit on foreign aid funds Congress approved.

title: Cracker Barrel latest corporate controversy Trump weighs in on
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has inserted himself in several corporate controversies, including American Eagle, Bud Light, TikTok, Amazon and more. See list

title: Trump says liberal donor George Soros and son should be prosecuted
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said major Democratic donor George Soros should be prosecuted, arguing without evidence that he supported violent protests.

title: What to know about Trump's takeover of DC's Union Station
shortDescription: Department of Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy said the federal government could manage the major transit hub better than its nonprofit partner.

title: Why did Trump halt their project? These union workers want answers
shortDescription: The Revolution Wind project was 80% complete when Trump put it on hold. Union laborers just want to work.

title: Will Trump's showdown with Fed's Lisa Cook end up at Supreme Court?
shortDescription: The Supreme Court could be asked to decide whether Federal Reserve governor Lisa Cook can stay while she fights president's attempt to fire her.

title: Trump says federal government will not approve new solar projects
shortDescription: President Trump escalated his criticism of renewable energy, announcing his administration will no longer approve new wind or solar projects.

title: The vote is in on the Iowa Senate special election. Here's who won:
shortDescription: National and state support from Republicans and Democrats poured into the race for Iowa Senate District 1 with the GOP supermajority in the balance.

title: Trump’s India tariffs now in effect
shortDescription: President Donald Trump’s 50% tariffs on Indian goods begin August 27, impacting $48.2B in exports including clothing and chemicals.

title: Train station takeover? Trump administration to take control of Union Station
shortDescription: Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy said it will reclaim management of Washington Union Station. Trump officials have complained about homeless camps.

title: Trump's doubling of tariffs on Indian imports takes effect
shortDescription: Trump's doubling of tariffs on goods from India took effect, escalating tensions between the world's two largest democracies and strategic partners.

title: Jack Smith fires back at 'partisan' probe into Trump prosecutions
shortDescription: Former special counsel Jack Smith fired back against a reported investigation into his handling of prosecutions against President Donald Trump.

title: Trump reacts to Swift, Kelce engagement
shortDescription: President Donald Trump congratulated singer Taylor Swift and NFL player Travis Kelce on their engagement despite past tensions.

title: Trump wishes Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce luck on engagement
shortDescription: President Donald Trump weighed in on Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift's engagement announcement at a Cabinet meeting Aug. 26: 'Wish them a lot of luck.'
